category.name: Product Structure.Design Context Context Definition
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PortalDesignContextFindInstallationTreeWalkIncrement
preference.preference_description: Specifies the direction the tree is maneuvered through to find the installation assembly for the specified BOM line. Valid Values: -1 - Traverses down from the top of the tree towards the BOM line. 1 - Traverses up from the BOM line towards the root.
